mcq.statement: Which structures are involved in controlling the human body temperature?

options.a: Blood vessel near the skin surface, the cerebellum, and sweet gland
options.b: Blood vessel near the skin surface, the Hypothalamus, and Skeletal Muscles
options.c: Kidneys, the cerebellum, the sweet gland
options.d: Kidneys, The Hypothalamus,, And Skeletal Muscles
